snippet: The president of Vassar College responds to a news article, “For Some Vassar Applicants, Joy Then Misery as College Corrects Mistake.”
lead_paragraph: The president of Vassar College responds to a news article, “For Some Vassar Applicants, Joy Then Misery as College Corrects Mistake.”

headline.main: From Vassar’s President: ‘I Want to Apologize’
headline.print_headline: From Vassar’s President: ‘I Want to Apologize’
